functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"teran",display:{Name:"\"§6Cache fureur\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Par tout temps, le ciel te paraît sombre\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mais personne ne lève jamais les yeux sur toi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7In all weathers, the sky seems dark to you\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but no one ever looks up at you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a2 §7HUN§a1\"}"],color:2302737},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:50s},{id:"minecraft:blast_protection",lvl:5s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:5.9,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,10001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:0.98,Operation:1,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,20001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.02,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,30001,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"teran",display:{Name:"\"§6Manteau de sang\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Insatiable pour le sang, aucune\"}","{\"text\":\"§7éclaboussure ne t'altère.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Insatiable for blood,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7no spatter alters you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§a1 §7HAS§a1\"}"],color:11012662},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:50s},{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:3s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:8.66,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,10002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:4.99,Operation:1,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,20002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.02,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,30002,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"teran",display:{Name:"\"§6Liberté\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7File sans-gêne, vers des horizons lointains\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et porte le vent avec toi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Run away without any discomfort, to distant horizons\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and carry the wind with you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a2 §7DAR§a1\"}"],color:2302737},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:50s},{id:"minecraft:fire_protection",lvl:7s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:9.06,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,10003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:3.4,Operation:1,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,20003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.02,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,30003,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"teran",display:{Name:"\"§6Méjobora\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Le lys est ta vertu, la rose ta colère\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et l'ancolie ta peine.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The lily is your virtue, the rose your anger\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and the columbine your sorrow.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7HER§a3 §7LUC§a1\"}"],color:16776099},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:50s},{id:"minecraft:feather_falling",lvl:4s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:3.13,Operation:0,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,10004,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:1.95,Operation:1,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,20004,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.02,Operation:0,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,30004,0,20000]}]}
